paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In 13 cases, there was a personal history of mild drug abuse, but none exhibited a lethal concentration of drugs in the blood prior to death.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as pathogenic based on ACMG guidelines.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence for pathogenicity based on ACMG classification.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was classified as pathogenic and is associated with sudden cardiac death.
key_quotes: In 13 cases, there was a personal history of mild drug abuse, but none exhibited a lethal concentration of drugs in the blood prior to death.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the SUD cases with a clinically actionable variant (pathogenic or likely pathogenic, VUS potentially pathogenic), the family was contacted to provide recommendations and options for further management.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS) but may be potentially pathogenic.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is classified as VUS and is associated with sudden cardiac death during exercise.
key_quotes: In the SUD cases with a clinically actionable variant (pathogenic or likely pathogenic, VUS potentially pathogenic), the family was contacted to provide recommendations and options for further management.

tables_processed.table_caption: Investigated cases showing genetic variants with potential relevance

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were successfully extracted.
